original: Löfmarck, Per Wilhelm, leg. läkare, Göteborg, f. 3/5/08 i Skärv, Ska-rab. 1., av godsäg. Carl Wilhelm L. o. Julia Svanström. G. 34 m. tandl. Ellen Stenquist. Barn: Carl Johan f. 35, Per Erik 37, Lars Fredrik 43. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 27, med. kand. 31 o. med. lic. 36 i Sthlm. utbildn. i kir. o. dermatol.-venereologi. Förordn. som prov:läk. o. und :läk. 36-38, assist :läk. v. Sahlgrenska sjukh. kir. avd. 38. *Löfquist, Anna-Svea Birgit, läroverksadjunkt, Väs’tervik, f. 15/11/08 i Lund. — Stud:ex. li Malmö 28, fil mag. i Lund 33, provår v. Sthlms folk-sk:’sem. 40-41. Vik. ämneslär. v. Lunds komm. flicksk. 34, Högsby emsk. real-sik. 34-35, vik. adj. i Öistersund 35, vik. v. Gbgs h. foilksk. samt i Piteå 36, i Skara 37, vik. ämneslär. v. Malmö borgarsk. 37, e. lär. i Skövde 37-38, e. adj. v. Hälsingb. gosislärov. 38, i Ludvika 39, e. lär. v. Motala komm. gymn. 39-40, komm. e. lär. i Arvika 41-43, e. adj. där 43-45, e. o. adj. i Vänersb. 46, adj. v. Västerviks h. a. 1. i matem. o. fys. sed. 47.
translated:
Löfmarck, Per Wilhelm, Leg. doctor, Gothenburg, b. 3/5/08 in Skärv, Ska-rab. 1., son of landowner Carl Wilhelm L. and Julia Svanström. Married in 1934 to dentist Ellen Stenquist. Children: Carl Johan b. 1935, Per Erik b. 1937, Lars Fredrik b. 1943. - Graduated from Göteborg University in 1927, completed bachelor's degree in medicine in 1931 and medical license in 1936 in Stockholm. Specialized in surgery and dermatology-venereology. Appointed as probationary doctor and assistant doctor from 1936-1938, assistant doctor at Sahlgrenska Hospital surgical department from 1938. 

*Löfquist, Anna-Svea Birgit, high school teacher, Västervik, b. 15/11/08 in Lund. - Graduated from Malmö in 1928, earned a Master's degree in Lund in 1933, probationary year at Stockholm folk school in 1940-1941. Temporary subject teacher at Lund municipal girls' school in 1934, at Högsby upper secondary school 1934-1935, temporary assistant in Östersund 1935, temporary positions in Gothenburg's primary school and in Piteå in 1936, in Skara in 1937, temporary subject teacher at Malmö secondary school in 1937, permanent teacher in Skövde 1937-1938, assistant teacher at Hälsingborg orphanage school in 1938, in Ludvika in 1939, permanent teacher at Motala municipal gymnasium 1939-1940, municipal permanent teacher in Arvika 1941-1943, assistant teacher there 1943-1945, temporary assistant in Vänersborg 1946, assistant teacher at Västervik's upper secondary school in mathematics and physics since 1947.
